Quick Facts

Real NameGerald Maxwell RiveraKnown As Maxwell Profession Singer, Songwriter, multi-instrumentalistMarital StatusDivorcedEx-Wife name Deimante GuobyteZodiacGeminiAge48 Years Old (2021)HeightIn Feet Inches-5â 11âWeight (Approx.)In Kilograms82kgDate of Birth 23 May 1973Birth PlaceBrooklyn, New York, U.S.ReligionNot KnownEthnicity(Mixed)Puerto Rican-HaitianNationalityAmericanSource Of IncomeSingingNet Worth$12 Million (Approx)LinksWikipedia

Gerald Maxwell Rivera, better known by his stage name Maxwell, is an American singer-songwriter, record producer, and multi-instrumentalist.

What is the net worth of Gerald Maxwell?

Gerald Maxwell is worth $10 million on average. Additionally, his principal source of income comes from his job as a musician, artist, singer, and composer.

When was Gerald Maxwell born?

Maxwell, a Puerto Rican father and a Haitian mother, was born in Brooklyn, New York, on May 23, 1973. In addition, his mother was raised in a devout Baptist family in Haiti. Maxwellâs father perished in a plane crash when Maxwell was three years old.

Career

At the age of 17, the Brooklyn, New York, native started writing songs. Similarly, he started writing music after getting a cheap Casio piano from a buddy. Maxwell began learning to play a variety of instruments after becoming a fan of what he called âjheri curl music,â which was popularized by R&B artists like Patrice Rushen, S.O.S. Band, and Rose Royce in the early 1980s. In the middle of the 1990s, Maxwell also started collaborating with singer Leon Ware and renowned guitarist Wah Wah Watson on his Maxwell debutâs Urban Hang Suite. The album was similarly recorded in New York Cityâs Electric Lady Studios, RPM Studios, Sorcerer Studios, and Chung King Studios, as well as Chicago, Illinoisâ CRC Studios, between 1994 and 1995.

Also View Sly Stoneâs Net Worth, Bio, Career, and More.

Blacksummersâ Night

From 2007 to 2009, Chung King Studios, Bowery Audio, and Platinum Sound Recording Studios in New York City hosted recording sessions for a new album. The entire album was produced by Maxwell and musician Hod David. The record was supposed to serve as the opening disc in a planned album trilogy.

Around this time, and seven years after his last performance, he made a surprise appearance as a musical guest at the 2008 BET Awards, where he performed the song âSimply Beautiful,â a tribute to the soul singer Al Green. Fans were shocked by his new appearance; his trademark pork-chop sideburns and dreadlocks had been replaced by a more mature and confident appearance.

Relationship Status of Gerald Maxwell

We are aware of various relationships Maxwell has been in. He had relationships with the TV personality and model Ananda Lewis, the actress Elisabeth RÃ¶hm from Germany, Camila Alves from Brazil, Selita Ebanks from the United States, and Deimante Guobyte from Brazil

Maxwell has been dating model, actor, rapper, dancer, and Dominican American TV personality Julissa Bermudez since 2014.

What are the height and weight of Gerald Maxwell?

Maxwell stands 1.82 meters tall and weighs 75 kilograms. There isnât any other information accessible about his physical characteristics, though.

Social Media Account

Speaking of his online presence, he may be found on Instagram under the handle maxwell. He has 789k Instagram followers. Additionally, he has 1.1 million followers on Twitter under the handle âmaxwell.â
